subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Ranked No. 202, Peter Polansky, who recovered from life-threatening injuries in 2006, is the only player on the ATP World Tour to qualify this year for three Grand Slam tournaments.
snippet: Ranked No. 202, Peter Polansky, who recovered from life-threatening injuries in 2006, is the only player on the ATP World Tour to qualify this year for three Grand Slam tournaments.
